conversation.text: If you're looking for a softer touch in French cinema, I recommend 'Before Sunset' (2004). The film stars Celine Dion and Richard Brinkley, and follows their heartfelt conversation on the French Riviera, showcasing delicate romance without too much action.

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
For a French language and culture fix, I recommend 'Le Curieux Case de Benjamin Button' (2004). This visually stunning film, with its charming story of time reversal, stars Dustin Hoffman in the lead role.

If you're looking for a more contemporary French crime-drama, 'The Score' (2016) directed by Marc Tuchman might interest you. The film features Gary Farmer and Edward Norton among others.
